unnormalised: Bore, tumi online asa, haka na? Mhaka dista, tumi “5G” ani “Wi-Fi 6” hanchi ulfat asli tumi kashicho vichar korunaka. Pun tumi kedna sangle tumi internetichi ulfat asli tumi kashi *khoree* asa? Ami tanke khuleponan sangta, desi paddatin, kashi korunk zata?
normalised: Borem, tumi online asaata, kiteak? Khoim, khoreponnan online. Tumhi chodd korun panch G ani W-i-F-i soho sarkhele utravalli vingddavtat, kitem-i chintinastana. Punn tumi kednaim thambun chintlaam ki hea sogllea internet utrancho orth khorench kitem mhunn? Aami taka deshi ritin ulouvya, kiteak?

unnormalised: Pehle, ami “bandwidth” vishayan sangta. Tumi YouTube-ak zoddta ani highway-acher kitle lanes asat tashi tanke dharn. Zaiti lanes (bandwidth) tumi tanke ektrann kortana, tumchi data-k tanke lagta, ji vishai tumchi sthir streaming ani vegai download kartam. Tumchi Bollywood blockbuster dial-up connection-acher kitek pasnd asat tashi dharun – tee bandwidth bottleneck zati! Tumi bandwidth-ak 100 Mbps mhunn sangta, ji Mumbai highway-acher 10-lane asati.
normalised: Poilech pavtim, aami "bandwidth" vishim uloiya. Ti Y-ou-T-ube-ak zoddpi highway-ichea lensanchi sonkhea mhunn chintat. Odhik lens (bandwidth) mhollear ekach vellar odhik data vhanvonk xakta, zaka lagun susthrit streaming ani vegim downloads zatat. Dial-up connection-acher tea noveach Bollywood blockbuster-ak pollovnchem chintat - tem bandwidth bottleneck zata tea vellar! Tumi bandwidth-ak ekxim M-b-p-s sarkhea ekkamni porgott kelolem pollovnchem xakta, jem dhaa-lensi Mumbai highway sarkhem asta.

unnormalised: Ani “latency” pan asta. Latency mhunje, delay, lag, video suru zata poilya lagta. Tumi online chai order dita pun takk 15 minutes lagta. Taka high latency mhanta, mhoji dost. Low latency mhunje tumchi goa – tumka tee chai (va webpage) *turant* zai. Gamers-an tanke high latency dhonkle, mhunje tumi zikk ani PUBG-an fragged zata. Gaming-achem ping 50ms-an kammi zaunk zai.
normalised: Uprant "latency" asa. Latency mhollear ushir, dhilovai, video suru zaunchea adim ek kshanik thoambo. Tumhi online chai-chi order keli mhunn chintat, ani ti pavonk pondra minttam lagtat. Ti unch latency, mhaje ixtta. Unni latency-chem dhyey asa—tumak ti chai (vo tem webpage) tatkaal zai asta. Gamers-ak khas korun unch latency-chi tirsann yeta; tacho orth zata jit ani P-U-B-G-in frag zatelim hankam modli ontor. Gaming-ak ek bori ping pon'nas m-s von unni astoli.

unnormalised: Ani, “IP address” vichar. Tumchi IP address mhunje tumchi ghorchi internet-achi address. Tee ekk ank (192.168.1.1 tashi) ji tumchi device-ak network-ancher odharta. Tumchi IP address nastali tumi kitlin cat videos pasta tumchi internet tanke zannanchi naka. Tumchi internet service provider (ISP) Airtel va Jio-k post office dharun, je data packets tumchi IP location-ak patavta.
normalised: Atam, hea "I-P address" kamak lagya. Tumchem I-P address internetacher tumchea ghara-chea address sarkhem asta. Tem ek nirall'li sonkhea (ekxim nonnovech dot ekxim saxttim dot ek dot ek sarkhem) zannem tumchem yontr network-ak vollkhon dita. Tea bhair, internet-ak khobor poddonam astolem ki tumi sodanch polloitaleo manzrakeo videos khuim dhaddcheo mhunn. Tumchea internet seva purvonkarak (I-S-P) Airtel vo Jio postol seva sarkhem chintat, tem tumchea nirall'llea I-P suvater data-che packets pavtaita.

unnormalised: “Cookies,” dusrean hatan, te tumchi computer-acher website store korta tumchi vishayan zannank. Tumchi favorite samosa, tumchi website lekhta tumchi dusre vellak sangunk. Te uppayukti asat (tumchi login details lekhta) pun khoree bhi (tee saree-achi ads, tumi dekhunk asli). Tumi cookies managment kortan va tumchi browser settings-an delete kortan.
normalised: "Cookies," dusre vatten, data-che lhan tukdde zatat je websites tumchea computer-acher tumchea vishim vostu ugddas dovornna khatir store kortat. Tem website tumchea avddichea samosacho prokar nod korun dita sarkhem asta, jem tumi bhett dita ten'na ani chodd suchounk xakta. Te upayogi zaunk xaktat (tumchea login details ugddas dovortat sarkhem) punn thodde dhastichei astaat (tumhi polloitale saree-chi jahiraat tumi polloita ten'na sarkhem). Tumi tumchea browser settings-antlean cookies cholovn vo kaddun uddovnk xakta.

unnormalised: Ani borepunak, “the cloud” bhulunk naka. Cloud mhunnje akashat udrata tashi na, “konachi computer” tashi bhaxen sangta. Tumi photo Google Drive-ak save korta va WhatsApp vaparta, tanke cloud-an store korta, tumi tumche kodden zaunk zata. Zori tumchi phone chore korta, tumchi photos Chennai va Bangalore va kontey servidoracher safe asat. Storage limits badlta, zashi Gmail account 15GB free storage-acher suru zatam.
normalised: Ani nimannem, "the cloud"-ak visrunk favona. The cloud kosli-i fovfovli vostu nhui jem akaxant soddot asta; tem fokot "dusreacho computer" mhunn sangpacho ek fantasocho upay asa. Tumhi Google Drive-ak photo save kortat vo W-hats-A-pp vaportat ten'na, tem cloud-ant store korun dovortat, jem khuimcheai suvaterlean mellounk xakta. Zori tumcho phone chorun vhelo zalear, tumche photos surakshit astat, khoim tori Chennai vo Bangalore vo khoim tori eka server-acher lipovn dovortat. Storage maryada bodolonk xakta, udahoronnak, ek G-mail account pondra G-B fukott storage-acho tharav kortalem.

unnormalised: Bore, tumka internet-ache ulfat asli tumi kitlem korta kashi dekhunk mellta. Atam tumi internet-ak sodhunk zata tumka zanvalponan zaite asle, zati! Ani dusrean vellak konachi “firewall” va “VPN” mhunn sangli tumi purren vichar korunaka, guarantee! Tumchi internet speed online tools vaporun check kortan, 25 Mbps down ani 3 Mbps up dekhun dhari.
normalised: Mhonnge tumchea kodden asa - sumar internet utrancho ek vegim ani khaxillea ritin margdorxon. Atam tumi poilim poros thoddea odhik gyanan internet cholounk vochat! Ani dusrea vellar konn "firewall" vo "V-P-N"-acho ullekh korta ten'na, tumi purnnponnan harounk naim, garanti! Tumchi speed online upkoronnanchi vaparnni korun porikxa korunk ugddas dovortat, atlean atlem ponchvis M-b-p-s down ani tin M-b-p-s up polloytat.
